title: Secure Cryptographic Policy Interface (SCPI) Configuration V01
description: Defines the mandatory parameters and constraints for cryptographic operations within a specific SCPI version, referenced by GIRM.

policyID.description: The specific identifier for this cryptographic policy version (must match GIRM's cryptoPolicyRef).

minimumKeyStrengthBits.description: The minimum required bit strength for any private signing key used with this policy.

allowedHashConfigurations.description: List of approved hashing algorithms and their configuration requirements.

minOutputLengthHex.description: Minimum hash output length required, in hex characters.

maxOutputLengthHex.description: Maximum hash output length allowed, in hex characters.

HashAlgorithm.description: Approved cryptographic algorithms for integrity and signature checks.
